Html:
Hi Experts,

I have set the timeoutMS but the request doesn't respond back after the timeout was met. Any advice or examples?

Thanks in advance.

Below is a code snippet:

OData.request( {requestUri:queryserviceUri, headers: {"WWW-Authenticate":"myRealm","Authorization":auth, "Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", "Cache-Control" : "no-cache"}, timeoutMS: 15000 },

Best Regards,
Yi Ying

Hi Yi Ying,

   If the request timeouts, then the error callback function should be fired instead of the success callback.  Can you confirm that this is the case?

Thanks,

Alex Trigo.
